landing_title: Frontend Developer (React/Next.js) & Jr Data Scientist. I turn data into product: analysis, modeling, and visualization to drive clear decisions and accessible UIs, using Python/SQL, EDA, and metrics/dashboards.
about_random_fact_three: Co-founder of a Mexican tech startup
about_subtitle: I’m a Front-End Developer and Junior Data Scientist based in NYC.
about_description: Since 2019, I have specialized in Front-End development with React, Next.js, and TypeScript, prioritizing performance and accessibility. I'm from Mexico City and currently live in New York. When I'm not coding, I'm tending to my plants.
about_history: I got into tech in 2018 while working at Rappi. I fell in love with building solutions and automating processes, so I took the leap into Ironhack’s Full-Stack bootcamp. Since then, I’ve focused on the front end: I’ve built products with React and Next.js for organizations like Zurich, MetLife, and the Government of Guadalajara, along with consulting projects (for example, a retail audit platform and real-time dashboards with ECharts). To round things out, I completed a nine-month Data Science program at TripleTen (Python, SQL, EDA, and ML), which helps me make data-informed decisions on every project.
footer_made: Developed with React, NextJs, Ant Design & ❤️
